inclusion.criterion: Children with severe asthma (poorly controlled by NIH guidelines )
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: admission in past as well as a >50% estimated risk of hospitalization in next yr)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: other major lung disease (e.g. cystic fibrosis or bronchopulmonary dysplasia)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 15-year-old boy with asthma, shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough. Did not respond to corticosteroid inhaler.
